pageContext.claim: “We had a Republican -- Dov Hikind of New York, he's a very strong Democrat, probably never uttered the word Republican in his life. And he was on television saying what the president of the United States did was incredible.”
pageContext.analysis: Hikind is a Democrat in the New York state assembly, but he has supported many Republicans for president. He endorsed George W. Bush in 2004 election, John McCain in 2008, and Mitt Romney in 2012. He did not endorse Trump in 2016, but said he would write in House Speaker Paul Ryan (R-Wis.).
